ValidationRule.description: Must have Client Process and Method of Payroll filled in before can check Ready for Payroll Turnover.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: Ready_for_Payroll_Turnover__c = true && Or( IsBlank(Client_Processed__c ), IsBlank(Text(Method_of_payroll_reporting__c )), IsBlank(Number_of_EEs__c) ) && NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ready for Payroll Turnover needs the following: Client Processed date, Method of Payroll selected, and Number of EEs populated
